Module: stormpath

This is the Stormpath module, you must require this in your applicatiom if you wish to use the Stormpth Node SDK.

Source:
  • stormpath.js, line 1
Example
var stormpath = require('stormpath');

Members

(static) Client

creates a new client instance

Source:
  • stormpath.js, line 32
Example
var stormpath = require('stormpath');
var client = new stormpath.Client();
